title: Contact Us
text: You can reach our support at +1-555-123-4567 or via the Contact Us page: https://example.com/contact. Support hours: Mon–Fri 9am–6pm.

title: Returns Policy
text: You have 30 days to return items. See https://example.com/returns for details and the return form.

title: Shipping Info
text: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Expedited shipping options are available at checkout. Track orders at https://example.com/track with your order ID.
